title: Bug 48373Can not get clients from TomcatBayeux
description: When call the getClients method,there will be a Exception:java.lang.ArrayStoreException: java.util.HashMap$Entrymaybe this method should be:public List<Client getClients() {return java.util.Arrays.asList(clients.values().toArray(new Client[0]));}instead of this:public List<Client getClients() {return java.util.Arrays.asList(clients.entrySet().toArray(new Client[0]));}
